name: The Artifact Room Of Naris
description:
This is gloomy and dark room with only a faint light radiating from the
walls.  A bunch of funny-looking items fill the center of the room.  There
is no furniture here what-so-ever.  The only way out seems to be west,
through the low steel door.

exits.description: You see only the back of a safe's steel door.
exits.keywords: door steel safe~ 2 7900 7910 S #7904 The Northern End Of The Hall~    You are standing in the northern end of the huge hall.  This part is under the grand wooden staircase so the light seems to be a little less bright here, but this doesn't affect your sight at all.  To the north lies the kitchen.  To the south lies the southern end of the hall.  To the east there is a huge metal door.  To the west there is a large aspenwood door.

exits.description:
You see a huge metal door.  From it a foul stench emanates.  The smell is
the most awful experience in your entire life.  A thought seeps through this
terrible stench and into your mind: 'Monsters', you feel BAD about opening
that door.
exits.keywords: door metal huge~ 2 -1 7913 D2 The rest of the hall lies in that direction, and so does the exit.

exits.description:
The door has 'SITTING ROOM' written on it.  It is made from Aspenwood and
is beautifully carved with small elves as main issue of sculpture.
exits.keywords: door aspen wood~ 1 -1 7905 S #7905 The Sitting Room Of Naris~    You are standing in the middle of a really comfortable place.  The walls are decorated with paintings of smiling Kings and Queens.  The most attractive picture is one of a Prince in shining armour.  By one of the walls there is an old armchair.  The only exit is through the aspenwood door to the east.

exits.description:
The door seems to be a very HEAVY door, carved completely from the trunk of
an Aspen tree.
exits.keywords: door aspen heavy~ 1 -1 7904 E chair armchair~ This is truly a wonderful relic of the past.  In it is a large cushion.

exits.description:
It is dark in there.  But the sounds from there are unmistakable.  The rats
are here for your information.
exits.keywords: larder wooden cupboard~ 1 -1 7907 D1 You can see the fridge from here.  There are drinks all over the place.

exits.description: You can see the northern end of the hall.
